reviewtext: We have used the CRV3 lithium photo battery in our kodak so we knew what we wanted to purchase however the product that is advertised in the picture is not what arrived. It was a CRV3 but was not "photo." i am not sure if this will make a difference, but I need the battery. it happened to be 1 product number off from the lithium photo. I think it should still work fine just my only con.
summary: Recieved was not what was shown in pict.
